title: Ep: 034 - Finding Truth in Design - Architect Tom Lane
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Maine Licensed Architect Tom Lane.  Our conversation centers largely around the topic of truth and how to think about it when working in a creative environment.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
